climbs.name: Stinky Knuckles
climbs.fa: Oliver Young, Chase Skidmore and Ty Johnston

content.description: Fun little route.  The crux is at the second bolt and pulls around to the arete.  The traverse over to the arete has some fun movement.
content.location: on the furthest right of the rock

content.description: This is a fantastic climb.  If it didn't have bird crap on the first couple of holds this would be a classic climb!  Very dynamic climbing leads you from the second bolt to the other side of the arete.  The fun section is right after clipping the second bolt but the fun doesn't end there!
content.protection: Sport, 4 bolts lead to chain anchor
content.location: This route shares the first bolt 4th bolt and anchors with stinky knuckles.  Go straight up and left after the first bolt of Stinky Knuckles until you reach the arete.

content.description: This has been bolted later then the two other climbs on the crag.  It's got some fun moves at the bottom that pull around a small roof.  It's pretty reachy till you pull around the roof.  You can go over the roof which would make for a much harder climb or you can pull around it for the 5.9 rating. From there it's gets a little balancey and thinner.  Fun but short climb.
content.location: This is just to the left of Bloody Knuckles and its easy to spot the first two bolts that lead right to the roof.

content.description: You can tope rope this or trad climb it.  The top two bolts have rap rings that are shared with Dirty Virgin.  The roof moves are the main feature here, they are hard and the rock that makes up the crack is sharp (hence the name) so tape up.
content.location: Just to the left of pockets is a very obvious crack that leads up over the roof.
